Translations.Text: tamane sum tha'i gayum che ke tame ekabijani madada nathi karata
parantu te (sau) ajana divase ajnakari bani gaya
te ekabija tarapha jo'i savala-javaba karava lagase
kahese ke tame to amari pase amari jamani bajuthi avata hata
te'o javaba apase ke na, parantu tame ja imanavala na hata
ane amari balajabari tamara para hati (ja) nahim, parantu tame (pote) vidrohi hata
have ame (badha) para amara palanaharani e vata sabita tha'i ga'i ke ame (yatana)no svada cakhisum
basa! Ame tamane pathabhrasta karya, ame pote ja pathabhrasta hata
ajana divase to (badha ja) yatanamam bhagidara che
ame aparadhi'o sathe avum ja kari'e chi'e
a te'o che ke, jyare temane kahevamam ave ke allaha sivaya ko'i pujya nathi, to a loko vidroha karata hata
ane kaheta hata ke sum ame amara pujyone eka pagala kavini vata mani la'ine chodi da'i'e
(Na na) parantu (payagambara) to satya lavya ane dareka payagambarone saca mane che
ni:Sanka tame du:Khadayi yatanano svada cakhaso
tamane teno ja badalo apavamam avase, je tame karata hata
parantu allaha ta'alana nikhalasa banda'o (suraksita hase)
temana mate ja nakki karela roji che
(dareka prakarana) phalo ane te ijajatavala, pratisthita hase
ne'amato vali jannatomam
asano para ekabijani same hase
sarabana jharanamo manthi pyala bhari-bharine temani vacce pheravavamam avase
je paradarsaka hase ane pivamam svadista hase
na tenathi mathano dukhavo thase ane na to te'o vikrta thase
ane temani pase nici najarovali, sundara ankhovali (huro) hase
evi, jeva ke, chupayela inda
(jannati loko) ekabija same jo'i savala karase
temana manthi eka kahese ke maro eka mitra hato
